product_description: Heavy sanding breaks in slim-fitting jeans cut from Mavi's Athletic lightweight knit designed to move with the comfort of your favorite sweats.
product_details_and_care:
Heavy sanding breaks in slim-fitting jeans cut from Mavi's Athletic lightweight knit designed to move with the comfort of your favorite sweats.
14" leg opening; 10 1/2" front rise
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
90% cotton, 8% polyester, 2% elastane
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6060349
product_size_info:
True to size.
Slim but comfortable through seat and thigh.
Tapers slightly below the knee for a narrower leg opening.
